column4: Hey, could anyone explain what might be the problem when I connect to my server using tightvncserver from a remote machine, I just get a chequered screen and nothing else? It connects fine but I see nothing other than that...thanks!
there are several settings that could cause the improper return of a xsession to a client pc
any obvious ones? it's a fresh install
using tightvnc a windows pc and a ubuntu box?
is the ubuntu box the host?
All I've done is a fresh install, then sudo apt-get install tightvncserver
how long have you let the connection sit? Is it just being slow?
I've left it for about 2 minutes and it just stays on that chequered screen
ok, is both machines on the same local network?
just covering bases, but the router is set to allow all communication over the lan right
yes, there's only a switch between hosts
do you have vnc setup to use ssh?
